name: Flipgoal
description:
This project was realised in the Enjmin Connected Workshop. The goal was to make a project that use electronics and be adapted to a handicap.

This game is a 2 player versus pinball that can be played in a custom arcade machine. 

Commands:

A and Q for the left player and P and M for the right player.

Gameplay:

  • You have 2 minutes to earn as many points as possible
  • Hit a bumper in your side gives 2 points
  • A fallen ball in the opponent's side gives 10 points
